connection
Class TCPSocket

java.lang.Object
  connection.TCPSocket

 class TCPSocket
extends java.lang.Object

A wrapper for Socket with some extra send and get methods.

Author:
Ari Hayes

          Whether or not the socket is connected to a server.

getByteArray

public void getByteArray(byte[] array,
                         int offset,
                         int length)
Gets bytes from the socket and writes them to an array.

Parameters:
array - The array to write to
offset - The index of the array to start at
length - The number of bytes to write.

public int getInteger()
Gets a bug-endian integer from the socket. TODO: Make ABSOLUTELY sure this doesn't screw up because of java forcing bytes signed.

-1 on failure.
